Taunton.East Taunton (MBTA station):
East Taunton is a proposed commuter rail station, to be built in East Taunton, Massachusetts as part of the MBTA Commuter Rail South Coast Rail project. Under plans released in 2017, it would open in 2022 as part of the project's first phase, then continue to be serviced when the second phase would be completed in 2030.


== History ==
In September 2008, MassDOT released 18 potential station sites, including two potential East Taunton sites: one just west of Route 24 if trains were routed through Middleborough, and one to the north off Route 140 if trains were routed through Stoughton or Attleboro.
